title: daily_farm_labor_no_days_off
summary: Daily agricultural labor activity at MaMeeFarm with no rest days.
description: This data unit documents routine agricultural labor carried out daily at MaMeeFarm. The observation reflects continuous hands-on farm work with no rest days, representing the lived reality and discipline inherent in small-scale farming.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for inspection convenience only and does not function as a cryptographic anchor within the DGCP verification chain.
